companyInfo.description: The Global News is an independent and alternative news company dedicated to reporting on current events impacting the world. Founded with the mission of providing accurate and up-to-the-minute news in a rapidly changing world, The Global News focuses on delivering a broad and in-depth perspective on every topic, with a commitment to transparency and objectivity.

journalists.name: Laura Martinez
journalists.bio: Laura Martinez is a seasoned European affairs correspondent, covering the EU and its policies for over a decade.

journalists.name: Marie Dupont
journalists.bio: Marie Dupont is a business journalist who covers European economic policy, with a focus on sustainability and corporate responsibility.

journalists.name: Carlos Peña
journalists.bio: Carlos Peña writes about the latest advancements in technology, focusing on AI, cybersecurity, and the ever-evolving landscape of digital innovation.

journalists.name: Sophia Green
journalists.bio: Sophia Green analyzes global political trends and provides in-depth insights into international relations and policy-making.
